title: ISic001171. I.Sicily inscription 001171
body:
Facsimile Images

[ὁ personal name τοῦ personal name]
τοῦ Πολυ[ξέ]νου
καὶ οἱ ἀλ<ειφόμενοι>
Ἡρακλεῖ.

Apparatus criticus

Text according to Kaibel in IG ; Torremuzza: ΚΑΙΟΙΑΛΛΟΙΠΟΛΙ

English translation

(---) son of Polyxenos and those who have been annointed (dedicate this) to Herakles

commentary

bibliography

  • 14.0349 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • 3.5592 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001252
